channel.title: [PI] New thing not being saved to player file? fixed myself nvm

item.title: [PI] New thing not being saved to player file? fixed myself nvm
item.dc:creator: @thock321 thock321
item.description:
@thock321 wrote:

I declared the int in Player.java, and did all the things for PlayerSave.java

} else if (token.equals("quest-kampig")) { p.kampig = Integer.parseInt(token2);

characterfile.write("kampig = ", 0, 9); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.kampig), 0, Integer.toString(p.kampig).length()); characterfile.newLine();

However, whenever i relog, i have to restart the quest
also, is there an alternative to @str@ to cross out lines for dspk servers? Using @str@ for my quest will crash my client

Nevermind i changed the
characterfile.write("kampig = ", 0, 9);
to
characterfile.write("quest-kampig = ", 0, 15);

saves 100% now

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] New thing not being saved to player file? fixed myself nvm
